tutorial.speak:
To show a curated calendar, embed it into a webpage using the web page builder.
Create a new web page or edit an existing one.
Add a section if you don't already have one by dragging and dropping it onto the page.
Drag and drop a calendar component into that section.
Select curated calendar and select the curated calendar you wish to display.
Click "Done". You now have a web page containing your calendar.
